font.p: For any set of vectors in [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline], we can always combine them to obtain the zero vector in [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline] by simply setting all of the coefficients to zero.
